abilities.desc: Marci grabs an allied or enemy target and throws it effortlessly behind her, damaging and slowing the unit if it's an enemy. Any enemy units in the landing area will also be damaged and slowed.
abilities.name: Dispose

abilities.desc: Vector targeted. Marci bounds to the targeted unit, choosing a direction and distance she will spring away from it. Upon reaching the unit, Marci lunges to her final destination, damaging and stunning enemies where she lands. The ally receives [25, 30, 35, 40]% bonus movement speed for 5.0s.
abilities.name: Rebound
abilities.notes: Marci's initial run to her target unit can be disjointed.

abilities.desc: Marci's loyalty helps ensure survival, imbuing a chosen allied hero and herself with lifesteal and attack damage.
abilities.name: Sidekick
abilities.notes: Marci can self-cast Sidekick to buff herself and the nearest allied hero within 700 range.

abilities.desc: Marci taps a hidden power, gaining Fury charges that allow her to deliver a rapid sequence of strikes  that slow movement and attack speed of the target for 2.0s. The last strike in every Fury combo creates a damaging pulse around the target. In between Fury combos, Marci is unable to attack for 1.75s.Marci gains 15% movement speed when Unleash is cast.
abilities.name: Unleash
abilities.notes: Once a Fury combo is started, each attack must be delivered within 1s or the Fury combo expires.
